summary: Itzhak Perlman  is an Israeli-American violinist.
full_text:
Itzhak Perlman  is an Israeli-American violinist, conductor, and pedagogue. Over course of his career, Perlman has performed worldwide, and throughout the United States in venues that have included a State Dinner at the White House honoring Queen Elizabeth, and a Presidential Inauguration, and has conducted the Detroit Symphony Orchestra and the Westchester Philharmonic.
In 2015, he was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom.
title: Itzhak Perlman
